code:
import axios from'axios';const API_BASE_URL=process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL||'http://localhost:5000/api';const api=axios.create({baseURL:API_BASE_URL,headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'}});// Add token to request headers
api.interceptors.request.use(config=>{const token=localStorage.getItem('authToken');if(token){config.headers.Authorization="Bearer ".concat(token);}return config;});export default api;
